name: Hex Fill Brain: Hexagon Blocks
description:
Get thinking hexagonally with this shape manipulation epic!
Drag and drop wacky shapes into increasingly complex patterns to complete levels in this easy to play, difficult to master puzzle game.
How to play:
-Drag the blocks around the screen.
-Let go to drop them.
-Try to get them all into the shape.
-Keep playing through all of the increasingly complex but rewarding levels!
